publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7278 Stuart McMillan: Glasgow Paddlesports Centre—That the Parliament welcomes plans for the creation of the Glasgow Paddlesports Centre at Port Dundas, Glasgow; notes that the planned centre hopes to attract 24,000 visitors per year and is part of wider regeneration of the area; considers paddlesports and the broader area of recreational boating and marine tourism important to the Scottish economy, and encourages those involved to ensure that the proposals for the Glasgow Paddlesports Centre are a success. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell*, Bill Kidd*, Bob Doris*, Anne McLaughlin*
S3M-7278 Glasgow Paddlesports Centre (lodged on 27 October 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Gil Paterson*, Sandra White*, Aileen Campbell*
